TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IRawElementProviderFragment implements class System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple

summary.span: 公開使用者介面 (UI) 項目上的方法與屬性，這些項目屬於多於一個層級深度的結構，例如清單方塊或清單項目。

span.span: Exposes methods and properties on user interface (UI) elements that are part of a structure more than one level deep, such as a list box or a list item.

summary.span: 由 UI 自動化提供者實作。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 片段的根節點必須支援介面，繼承自。The root node of the fragment must support the interface, which inherits from .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property BoundingRectangle As Rect
public: property System::Windows::Rect BoundingRectangle { System::Windows::Rect get(); };

span.span: Gets the bounding rectangle of this element.
The bounding rectangle, in screen coordinates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 項目，則部分不易辨認或局部超出螢幕時，需要不裁剪。No clipping is required if the element is partly obscured or partly off-screen. 屬性應該設定為指出矩形是否實際上為可見。The property should be set to indicate whether the rectangle is actually visible. 週框矩形內不是所有點都都是可按。Not all points within the bounding rectangle are necessarily clickable. ## Examples 下列範例程式碼，這個周框的內部狀態就會保留在，它會轉換成在傳回之前。In the following example code, the internal state of the bounding rectangle is kept in a , which is converted to a before being returned. [!code-csharp[UIAFragmentProvider_snip#104](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAFragmentProvider_snip/CSharp/ListItemFragment.cs#104)] [!code-vb[UIAFragmentProvider_snip#104](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAFragmentProvider_snip/VisualBasic/ListItemFragment.vb#104)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property FragmentRoot As IRawElementProviderFragmentRoot

span.span: Retrieves the root node of the fragment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作的提供者應該會傳回本身。A provider that implements should return itself. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示在片段中，例如清單方塊內的清單項目實作的項目。The following code example shows an implementation for an element in a fragment, such as a list item within a list box. [!code-csharp[UIAFragmentProvider_snip#105](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAFragmentProvider_snip/CSharp/ListItemFragment.cs#105)] [!code-vb[UIAFragmentProvider_snip#105](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAFragmentProvider_snip/VisualBasic/ListItemFragment.vb#105)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple[] GetEmbeddedFragmentRoots() cil managed

summary.span: 擷取片段根目錄的陣列，這些根目錄內嵌於以目前項目為根目錄的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]項目樹狀目錄中。

span.span: Retrieves an array of fragment roots that are embedded in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element tree rooted at the current element.
An array of root fragments, or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會傳回陣列的片段，只有當目前的項目裝載另一個[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]架構。This method returns an array of fragments only if the current element is hosting another [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] framework. 大部分的提供者傳回`null`。Most providers return `null`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32[] GetRuntimeId() cil managed

summary.span: 擷取項目的執行階段識別項。

span.span: Retrieves the runtime identifier of an element.

returns.span: 項目的唯一執行階段識別項。

span.span: The unique run-time identifier of the element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作應該傳回`null`對應到視窗控制代碼的項目。Implementations should return `null` for an element that corresponds to a window handle. 其他項目應傳回陣列，其中包含，後面接著為片段內唯一的值。Other elements should return an array that contains , followed by a value that is unique within the fragment. 它是提供者的責任在於確保唯一性片段; 內例如，在清單中的每個項目必須是個別編號。It is the provider's responsibility to ensure uniqueness within the fragment; for example, each item in a list must be individually numbered. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]引擎會確定此識別碼是唯一所有的執行個體之間，方式是將轉譯值。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] engine ensures that the identifier is unique among all instances, by translating the value. ## Examples 下列範例程式碼片段，例如清單方塊內的項目內的項目所顯示這個方法的實作。The following example code shows an implementation of this method by an element within a fragment, such as an item within a list box. 項目都有它自己的片段中，這個執行個體中的唯一識別碼和方法所傳回的識別項是唯一的值可確保[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]樹狀目錄中。The item has its own unique identifier within this instance of the fragment, and the value ensures that the identifier returned by the method is unique in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree. [!code-csharp[UIAFragmentProvider_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAFragmentProvider_snip/CSharp/ListItemFragment.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIAFragmentProvider_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAFragmentProvider_snip/VisualBasic/ListItemFragment.vb#101)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderFragment Navigate(valuetype System.Windows.Automation.Provider.NavigateDirection direction) cil managed
Public Function Navigate (direction As NavigateDirection) As IRawElementProviderFragment

span.span: The direction in which to navigate.

summary.span: 擷取樹狀目錄內指定之方向中的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]項目。

span.span: Retrieves the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element in a specified direction within the tree.

returns.span: 指定之方向的項目，如果該方向沒有項目，則為 。

span.span: The element in the specified direction, or if there is no element in that direction

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]伺服器的這個方法的實作定義的結構[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]項目樹狀結構。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] server's implementations of this method define the structure of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element tree. 瀏覽必須支援向上到父代，向下拖曳至第一個和最後一個子系，以及此舉下一步] 和 [上一個同層級，適用的情況。Navigation must be supported upward to the parent, downward to the first and last child, and laterally to the next and previous siblings, as applicable. 每個子節點只能有一個父代，而且必須放置在達到從由父代的同層級鏈結和。Each child node has only one parent and must be placed in the chain of siblings reached from the parent by and . 在同層級之間的關聯性必須是雙向的完全相同： 如果 A 是 B 的，然後 B 為 A 的。Relationships among siblings must be identical in both directions: if A is B's , then B is A's . A之中未包含任何，和之中未包含任何。A has no , and a has no . 片段根目錄不支援瀏覽至父系或同層級;片段根目錄之間的導覽是由預設視窗提供者處理。Fragment roots do not enable navigation to a parent or siblings; navigation among fragment roots is handled by the default window providers. 項目在片段中的只能巡覽至該片段內的其他項目。Elements in fragments must navigate only to other elements within that fragment. ## Examples 下列範例程式碼顯示實作由片段根具有單一子項目。The following example code shows the implementation of by a fragment root that has a single child element. 實作的項目是片段根，因為它不會啟用瀏覽至父項目或同層級項目。Because the implementing element is a fragment root, it does not enable navigation to a parent element or sibling elements. [!code-csharp[UIAProvider_snip#105](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAProvider_snip/CSharp/FragmentRoot.cs#105)] [!code-vb[UIAProvider_snip#105](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAProvider_snip/VisualBasic/FragmentRoot.vb#105)] 下列範例示範實作所表示的單一項目在清單方塊中的片段。The following example shows an implementation by a fragment that represents a single item within a list box. 在此情況下，項目可讓瀏覽其父系和同層級，但不是屬於任何子系。In this case, the element enables navigation to its parent and siblings, but not to any children. [!code-csharp[UIAFragmentProvider_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAFragmentProvider_snip/CSharp/ListItemFragment.cs#103)] [!code-vb[UIAFragmentProvider_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAFragmentProvider_snip/VisualBasic/ListItemFragment.vb#103)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetFocus() cil managed

summary.span: 將焦點設定為這個項目。

span.span: Sets the focus to this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]架構可確保裝載此片段介面的一部分為已經焦點之前呼叫這個方法。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] framework will ensure that the part of the interface that hosts this fragment is already focused before calling this method. 您的實作應該更新僅內部焦點狀態。例如，藉由重新繪製的清單項目，可顯示它具有焦點。Your implementation should update only its internal focus state; for example, by repainting a list item to show that it has the focus. 如果您傾向於[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]不著重在父視窗，請將設定選項片段根。If you prefer that [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] not focus the parent window, set the option in for the fragment root.
